data.headline: Nasdaq futures outperform as easing AI disruption worries and Nvidia's reported multi-year GPU deal with Meta boost sentiment
bullets: Nvidia rallies, lifting chipmakers like Analog Devices after an earnings beat and software names Cadence and Synopsys on strong outlooks and Nvidia stake disclosure
Palantir, Wingstop, Apple, Garmin, and Moderna also post premarket gains
Palo Alto Networks slides amid sector rotation, while Genuine Parts lags
Dow and S&P 500 futures see modest gains, with Russell futures trailing
Traders await 2 PM ET Fed minutes for rate-cut signals as global inflation remains sticky but softening
Treasury yields hover near multiweek lows around 4.1%, the dollar stays firm, and gold trades above $4,900
A quiet macro and earnings calendar supports mild premarket strength following recent tech volatility
